Jerome OngLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 11 Sep 2019For DBS treasures it's 350k, similar to UOB privilege banking. Whereas OCBC premier & SCB priority is 200k. Usually, banks that are not very hard up for clients(DBS & OCBC) will give fewer benefits such as fewer airport lounges, no special gifts when buying Products, less sign up bonus when crediting the minimum sum.0 comments0

Png Cheng Xi Damien, Happy Life Seeker at HomeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 30 Mar 2019You will need to speak with an relationship manager to find out. One by one. They change all the time and any time.0 comments0
